text: Felix Davis (10 July 1869 – 1950) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1869 births Category:1950 deaths Category:People from Hasland Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Brampton Works F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Ilkeston Town F.C.
